00015 #ifndef BUCKETLIFO_H
00016 #define BUCKETLIFO_H
00017 
00018 #include "config.h"
00019 #include "RoutingNode.h"
00020 #include <math.h>
00021 
00022 // The number of rows and columns in the heap
00023 const uint32 ROWS    = 4000;
00024 const uint32 COLUMNS = 100;
00025 
00026 // The maximum number of elemenst in the heap
00027 const uint32 MAX_NBR_OF_ELEMENTS = ROWS * COLUMNS;
00028 
00029 /* The 2^MATRIX_DIFF_EXPONENTIAL is the difference between the rows
00030    in the matrix */
00031 const uint32 MATRIX_DIFF_EXPONENTIAL = 10;
00032 
00033 // The difference between two rows in the matrix
00034 const uint32 MATRIX_DIFF = 1024;
00035 
00059 class BucketLIFO {
00060    public:
00064       BucketLIFO();
00065 
00069       ~BucketLIFO();
00070          
00076       inline void enqueue(RoutingNode* routingNode);
00077          
00083       inline RoutingNode* dequeue();
00084          
00089       inline bool isEmpty();
00090 
00094       inline bool thingsLeftInBucket();
00095 
00099       inline void markBucket();
00100       
00104       void reset();
00105 
00110       void dump();
00111  
00112    private:
00117       inline void flushHeap();
00118 
00120       RoutingNode* m_matrix[ROWS][COLUMNS];
00121          
00123       uint32 m_nbrUsed[ROWS];
00124 
00126       uint32 m_heapStartIndex;
00127 
00129       uint32 m_costsStartAt;
00130          
00132       uint32 m_totalNbrUsed;
00133 
00135       uint32 m_largestTotalNbrUsed;    // remove
00136 
00138       bool m_bucketMarked;
00139    
00140 }; // BucketLIFO

00142 // =======================================================================
00143 //                                      Implementation of inline methods =
00144 
00145 inline void BucketLIFO::markBucket()
00146 {
00147    m_bucketMarked = true;
00148 }
00149 
00150 inline bool BucketLIFO::isEmpty()
00151 {
00152    return (m_totalNbrUsed == 0) || 
00153           ( m_bucketMarked && (m_nbrUsed[m_heapStartIndex] == 0) );
00154 }
00155 
00156 inline bool BucketLIFO::thingsLeftInBucket()
00157 {
00158    return (m_nbrUsed[m_heapStartIndex] > 0);
00159 }
00160 
00161 inline void BucketLIFO::flushHeap()
00162 {
00163    while (m_nbrUsed[m_heapStartIndex] == 0) {
00164       if (++m_heapStartIndex == ROWS)
00165          m_heapStartIndex = 0;
00166       m_costsStartAt += MATRIX_DIFF;
00167    }
00168 }     
00169 
00170 inline void
00171 BucketLIFO::enqueue(RoutingNode* routingNode)
00172 {
00173    uint32 cost = routingNode->getEstCost();
00174    int32 rowIndex;
00175 
00176    if (cost < m_costsStartAt) {
00177       mc2dbg1 << "ERROR: Low cost in heap: " << cost << endl;
00178       rowIndex = m_heapStartIndex;
00179    }
00180    else
00181       if (cost >= (m_costsStartAt + (ROWS << MATRIX_DIFF_EXPONENTIAL))) {
00182          mc2dbg8 << "Higher cost of node than allowed in heap: " <<
00183             cost << endl;
00184          rowIndex = m_heapStartIndex - 1;
00185          if (rowIndex < 0)
00186             rowIndex += ROWS;
00187       }
00188       else {
00189          rowIndex = ((cost - m_costsStartAt) >> MATRIX_DIFF_EXPONENTIAL) +
00190             m_heapStartIndex;
00191          
00192          while (rowIndex >= (int32)ROWS)
00193             rowIndex -= ROWS;
00194       }
00195    
00196    m_matrix[rowIndex][m_nbrUsed[rowIndex]++] = routingNode;
00197    m_totalNbrUsed++;
00198    if (m_totalNbrUsed > m_largestTotalNbrUsed)
00199       m_largestTotalNbrUsed = m_totalNbrUsed;
00200 
00201 } // enqueue
00202 
00203 inline RoutingNode*
00204 BucketLIFO::dequeue()
00205 {
00206    RoutingNode* minNode = NULL;
00207    uint32 minCost = MAX_UINT32;
00208    bool again = false;
00209    
00210    do {
00211       flushHeap();
00212       minNode = m_matrix[m_heapStartIndex][--m_nbrUsed[m_heapStartIndex]];
00213       minCost = minNode->getEstCost();
00214       again = (minCost >= (m_costsStartAt + MATRIX_DIFF));
00215       if(again){
00216          m_totalNbrUsed--; // enqueue increases this
00217          enqueue(minNode);
00218       }
00219       
00220    } while(again);
00221    /*
00222    if (m_totalNbrUsed) {
00223       while (minCost >= (m_costsStartAt + MATRIX_DIFF)) {
00224          flushHeap();
00225          minNode = m_matrix[m_heapStartIndex][--m_nbrUsed[m_heapStartIndex]];
00226          minCost = minNode->getEstCost();
00227          if (minCost >= (m_costsStartAt + MATRIX_DIFF)) {
00228             m_totalNbrUsed--; // enqueue increases this
00229             enqueue(minNode);
00230          }
00231       }
00232       m_totalNbrUsed--;
00233    }
00234    */
00235    m_totalNbrUsed--;
00236    return minNode;
00237 }
